title: How do I find my hours played(including normal games)
body: Since I have played this game since early season 4, I have wanted to check how much time I spent into this game. However, every website doesn't seem to work, they all say that I only spent 80 hours on this game when I know as a fact I have played more than 1000 games. Can anyone tell me how to check my hours played without spending money? Thanks

replies.body: We don't have a way right now that automatically calculates this for you in the client, but it looks like you were over 2000 hours but still a bit shy of 2500.
Is there no site that can calculate this? Sites like wol.gg only calculate ranked games. (main acc is EpicPlant EUW)
